scripts.postbuild:circuit: cp build/circuits/zkeys/withdraw.zkey frontend/assets/public && cp build/circuits/withdraw_js/withdraw.wasm frontend/assets/public
scripts.build:circuit:export:sample-zkey: for circuit in build/circuits/*.r1cs; do snarkjs groth16 setup $circuit powersOfTau28_hez_final_15.ptau build/circuits/zkeys/$(basename -- $circuit .r1cs).zkey;done
scripts.build:circuit:export:verifier: for zkey in build/circuits/zkeys/*.zkey; do snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier $zkey build/circuits/verifiers/$(basename -- $zkey .zkey | perl -nE 'say ucfirst').sol;done
scripts.build:circuit: npm run build:circuit:precompile && npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:export:sample-zkey && npm run build:circuit:export:verifier
scripts.build:oldcircuit:compile: npx circom circuits/withdraw.circom -o build/circuits/withdraw.json && npx snarkjs info -c build/circuits/withdraw.json
scripts.build:oldcircuit:setup: npx snarkjs setup --protocol groth -c build/circuits/withdraw.json --pk build/circuits/withdraw_proving_key.json --vk build/circuits/withdraw_verification_key.json
scripts.build:oldcircuit: mkdir -p build/circuits && npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:bin && npm run build:circuit:contract
scripts.build:browserify: npx truffle migrate --reset && npx browserify src/cli.js -o frontend/index.js --exclude worker_threads && cp build/contracts/ETHFlexClub.json frontend/assets/json/ && cp build/contracts/FlexNFT.json frontend/assets/json/ && cp build/circuits/withdraw.json frontend/assets/json/ && cp build/circuits/withdraw_proving_key.bin frontend/assets/bin/
scripts.build: npm run build:circuit && npm run build:contract && npm run build:browserify
scripts.flat: npx truffle-flattener contracts/ETHTornado.sol > ETHTornado_flat.sol && npx truffle-flattener contracts/ERC20Tornado.sol > ERC20Tornado_flat.sol
